text: Pominayte Allakha v ustanovlennyye dni. A yesli kto toropitsya [i zavershayet obryad] v dva dnya, to net grekha na nem. A yesli kto zaderzhitsya i [zavershit obryad po istechenii trekh dney], to net grekha na nem. I vse eto dlya bogoboyaznennykh. Boytes' zhe Allakha i znayte, chto k Nemu prizovut vas [i predstanete] vy pred Nim
